overview: The institute is committed to getting itself recognized as a leader in Information Technology related Science and Engineering. It wishes to establish a firm foundation for education and research with a high-quality faculty base and having the vision to be the fountainhead of new ideas and innovations in Technology and Science. IIIT Bhopal aims to create an ambiance in which new ideas, research and scholarship flourish and from which the leaders and innovators and IT-entrepreneurs of tomorrow emerge
overview2: The institute is committed to getting itself recognized as a leader in Information Technology related Science and Engineering. It wishes to establish a firm foundation for education and research with a high-quality faculty base and having the vision to be the fountainhead of new ideas and innovations in Technology and Science. IIIT Bhopal aims to create an ambiance in which new ideas, research and scholarship flourish and from which the leaders and innovators and IT-entrepreneurs of tomorrow emerge.Senate is the supreme academic administrative body of IIIT Bhopal. Under Senate the respective Board of Studies functions for the academic administration with the guidelines prescribed by the Senate. The respective details for the Senate, BoS and Academic rules and schemes with curriculum are available in the institute website.
